title: Global - Bad Certificate PUA
description: Detects known bad certificate signers associated with Potentially Unwanted Applications (PUA).
author: aj-tap
syntax: from * | grep('Echo Infini Sdn. Bhd.',this) or grep('Glint By J Sdn. Bhd',this) or grep('Summit Nexus Holdings Llc, Bhd',this)

title: Botnet C2 Hosting ISP
description: IP belongs to an Internet Service or Hosting Provider that has a historical or ongoing association with hosting infrastructure used for botnet command and control (C2) servers, compromised hosts, or other botnet-related activities. Remember that even these providers host legitimate services, so further analysis of the traffic will be necessary to confirm malicious activity.
author: aj-tap
syntax: from 'ipinfo' | grep('Frantech',org) or grep('Ponynet',org) or grep('BuyVM',org) or grep('OVH',org) or grep('Hetzner',org) or grep('DigitalOcean',org) or grep('Linode',org) or grep('Akamai',org) or grep('Choopa',org) or grep('Vultr',org) or grep('Contabo',org) or grep('LeaseWeb',org) or grep('RamNode',org) or grep('Psychz Networks',org)

title: Detect Cobaltstrike C2
description: This rule detects known c2 jarm hashes.
author: aj-tap

title: Detect Adwind RAT
description: Detects Adwind RAT via JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects AgentZSZ-nexgen malware via JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects Dridex Loader variants via JA3 fingerprint.

title: Detect Generic Suspicious TLS Client (PUP, Throwback, Adernhaste)
description: Detects a generic suspicious JA3 TLS client fingerprint reused by multiple threats including PUPs, SilentBreak Throwback, and Adernhaste.
author: aj-tap

title: Detect HuadServHelper and APT-Sidewinder
description: Detects HuadServHelper and APT-Sidewinder activity via shared JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects OSTP Backswap malware via JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects PowerShell Dropper scripts via JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects Qbot (Quakbot) malware via JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects RDPWrap Stealer via JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects ServHelper backdoor and Sodinokibi (REvil) ransomware via shared JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects VN Malware via JA3 fingerprint.

description: Detects Cobalt Strike Beacon/Listener running on Java 11 via JARM fingerprint.

title: Detect MacShell and MacShellSwift

description: Detects Metasploit Framework SSL listeners (Variant 1) via JARM fingerprint.

title: Detect PoshC2 and MacC2
description: Detects PoshC2 and MacC2 infrastructure via JARM fingerprint.

title: Detect Python3 Generic C2s (Mythic, Shad0w, GRAT2, SILENTTRINITY)
description: Detects generic Python 3 C2 frameworks (Mythic, MacC2 v3.8.2, Shad0w, GRAT2, SILENTTRINITY) using Shodan JARM fingerprints. High potential for false positives as it may match generic Python SSL implementations.
author: aj-tap

title: Detect Sliver C2
description: Detects Sliver C2 (Go-Lang based) infrastructure via JARM fingerprint.
author: aj-tap

title: Detect Merlin C2
description: This rule detects known merlin jarm hashes. go 1.15.2 linux/amd64 with github.com/gorilla/websocket package
author: aj-tap

title: Detect Cobalt Strike JARM (Cloudflare)
description: Detects Cobalt Strike infrastructure behind Cloudflare via JARM fingerprint.
author: none

title: Detect Cobalt Strike Watermark
description: Detects the common watermark attribute (987654321) identified on CS beacons, specifically those linked to LockBit affiliates.
author: none

title: Detect Cobalt Strike Default Certificate CN
description: Detects the default subject Common Name (CN) found in CS default certificates CN=Major Cobalt Strike.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('Major Cobalt Strike', this) | quiet(this)

title: Detect Cobalt Strike Pwn3rs Striked CN
description: Detects the custom certificate CN from a cracked Cobalt Strike version (Pwn3rs Striked).
author: none

title: Detect Brute Ratel C4 (BRC4) Headers
description: Detects common HTTP response attributes observed in BRC4 C2s, particularly the content length and type combination.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('Content-Length: 14', this) | grep('charset=utf-8', this) |  quiet(this)

title: Detect Brute Ratel C4 (BRC4) JARM 1
description: Detects Brute Ratel C4 C2 infrastructure via JARM fingerprint (Example 1).
author: none

title: Detect Mythic C2 Default CN
description: Detects the default certificate Common Name (CN) for the Mythic C2 framework.
author: none

title: Detect Mythic C2 Favicon Hash
description: Detects Mythic C2 instances using the associated favicon hash.
author: none

title: Detect Havoc C2 HTTP Header
description: Detects Havoc C2 instances using the hardcoded 'x-havoc true' HTTP header string.
author: none

title: Detect Havoc C2 JARM
description: Detects Havoc C2 infrastructure via JARM fingerprint.
author: none

title: Detect Sliver C2 JARM
description: Detects Sliver C2 infrastructure via JARM fingerprint.
author: none

title: Detect Sliver C2 Certificate O=mad
description: Detects Sliver C2 using custom certificates generated by the 'mad' tool via the organization string.
author: none

title: Detect Manjusaka C2 HTTP Redirect
description: Detects Manjusaka C2 infrastructure using the default clear text HTTP redirection destination.
author: none

title: Detect Manjusaka C2 FOFA Body Hash
description: Detects Manjusaka C2 configurations using the associated FOFA body hash.
author: none

title: Detect DayBreak (BAS) Listener CN
description: Detects the certificate Common Name (CN) for the DayBreak listener CN=bas-listener.
author: none

title: Detect DayBreak (BAS) Favicon Hash
description: Detects the exposed DayBreak admin panel using its favicon hash.
author: none

title: Detect Gophish Login Page Title
description: Detects Gophish phishing panels using the default login page title.
author: none

title: Detect Gophish JARM
description: Detects Gophish infrastructure via JARM fingerprint.
author: none

title: Detect Pikabot C2 JARM
description: Detects Pikabot C2 servers using randomized certificates via JARM fingerprint.
author: none

title: Detect COLDRIVER (SPICA) JARM (Zeros)
description: Detects SPICA Backdoor C2 infrastructure using an all-zeros SSL JARM fingerprint.
author: none

title: Detect COLDRIVER (SPICA) Certificate CN
description: Detects SPICA Backdoor C2s using the SSL Certificate common name 'Internet Widgits Pty Ltd'.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('Internet Widgits Pty Ltd', this) | quiet(this)

title: Detect Rhysida PortStarter Headers
description: Detects Rhysida (PortStarter) C2 using the unique combination of HTTP Server header and Www-Authenticate field.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('Server: BaseHTTP/0.6 Python/3.8.10 Www-Authenticate: Basic realm=Demo Realm', this) | quiet(this)

title: Detect Lazarus (BeaverTail) FTP Banner
description: Detects Lazarus Group (BeaverTail) C2 pivot points using the specific FTP service banner.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('220 pyftpdlib based ftpd ready', this) | quiet(this)

title: Detect APT43 JARM (Port 443)
description: Detects APT43 infrastructure on port 443 via JARM fingerprint.
author: none

title: Detect APT38 RDP Certificate CN
description: Detects APT38/Bluenoroff infrastructure using the RDP certificate subject Common Name (CN).
author: none

title: Detect APT28 Reused Image Hash
description: Detects APT28/Fancy Bear infrastructure pivot points using the SHA-256 hash of a reused image (Capture2.png).
author: none

title: Detect Scattered Spider JS Hash
description: Detects Scattered Spider phishing infrastructure using the SHA-256 hash found within the okta-sign-in.min.js JavaScript code.
author: none

title: Detect CS Malleable (Bing Profile)
description: Detects Cobalt Strike infrastructure using the Bing Malleable Profile by searching for unique strings in SSL certificate fields.
author: none

title: Detect CS Malleable (Gmail Profile)
description: Detects Cobalt Strike infrastructure using the Gmail Malleable Profile by searching for unique strings in SSL certificate fields.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('ssl:google', this) | grep('ssl:gmail.com', this) | quiet(this)

title: Detect CS Malleable (Windows Update Profile)
description: Detects Cobalt Strike infrastructure using the Windows Update Malleable Profile by searching for unique strings and the "404 not found" string in SSL certificate fields.
author: none

title: Detect ReverseSSH (Cloudflare Cert)
description: Detects ReverseSSH infrastructure using the specific Cloudflare certificate organization string.
author: none

title: Detect Open Directories (Python)
description: Detects Python-based open directories using the specific title string.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('Directory Listing for /', this) | quiet(this)

title: Detect Open Directories (Apache/Nginx)
description: Detects Apache/Nginx open directories using the common title string.
author: none

title: Detect APT43/Kimsuky Cert Size (3072-bit)
description: Detects APT43/Kimsuky infrastructure using the certificate attribute indicating a 3072-bit public key size.
author: none

title: Detect APT43/Kimsuky Hosting Org (CHOOPA)
description: Detects APT43/Kimsuky infrastructure hosted on AS-CHOOPA using the organization string 'The Constant Company LLC'.
author: none
syntax: from 'ipinfo' | grep('The Constant Company LLC', org) | quiet(this)

title: Detect APT38 planet.svg Hash
description: Detects APT38/Bluenoroff infrastructure using the unique hash for the 'planet.svg' image component.
author: none

title: Detect APT38 astronaut.svg Hash
description: Detects APT38/Bluenoroff infrastructure using the unique hash for the 'astronaut.svg' image component.
author: none

title: Detect APT38 404.css Hash
description: Detects APT38/Bluenoroff infrastructure using the unique hash for the '404.css' file component.
author: none

title: Detect COLDRIVER (SPICA) Port 3000 Banner
description: Detects COLDRIVER (SPICA) C2 infrastructure using the specific banner response string observed on port 3000.
author: none

title: Detect DayBreak (BAS) Server Cert CN
description: Detects DayBreak C2 using the default server certificate common name issuer.common_name=bas-server
author: none

title: Detect ReverseSSH (Cloudflare, Inc. Cert)
description: Detects ReverseSSH infrastructure using the specific Cloudflare certificate organization string 'Cloudflare, Inc'.
author: none

title: Detect PoshC2 Default Certificate Strings
description: Detects PoshC2 infrastructure using default certificate strings (e.g., ssl:Pajfds ssl:P18055077).
author: none

title: Detect Responder Deprecated Date String
description: Detects deprecated versions of Responder using a hardcoded date string found in the banner.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('Date: Wed, 12 Sep 2012 13:06:55 GMT', this) | quiet(this)

title: Detect Scattered Spider OKTA Favicon Hash
description: Detects Scattered Spider phishing infrastructure using the favicon hash for the OKTA sign-in page template.
author: none

title: Detect Evilginx Admin Login Title
description: Detects Evilginx phishing framework admin panel using the title string 'EvilginxLogin'.
author: none

title: Detect Evilginx Rickroll Image Hash 1
description: Detects Evilginx infrastructure using a SHA-256 hash of a Rick Astley redirection image (Example 1).
author: none

title: Detect Evilginx Rickroll Image Hash 2
description: Detects Evilginx infrastructure using a SHA-256 hash of a Rick Astley redirection image (Example 2).
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory (Directory /)
description: Detects generic open directories using the alternate title string Directory
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory (Directory listing of /)
description: Detects generic open directories using the alternate title string 'Directory listing of /'.
author: none
syntax: from 'shodan' | grep('Directory listing of /', this) | quiet(this)

title: Detect Open Directory File .exe
description: Detects exposed directories containing the malicious file extension '.exe'.
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory File .dll
description: Detects exposed directories containing the malicious file extension '.dll'.
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory File .aspx
description: Detects exposed directories containing the file extension '.aspx', often indicating web shells or command execution endpoints.
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory Filename Cobalt Strike
description: Detects exposed Cobalt Strike files within open directories.
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory Filename Meterpreter
description: Detects exposed Meterpreter files within open directories.
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory Filename bloodhound
description: Detects exposed Bloodhound reconnaissance tool files within open directories.
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory Related Term fud.exe
description: Detects files related to 'Fully Undetectable' (FUD) malware within open directories.
author: none

title: Detect Open Directory Related Term ransomNote
description: Detects files related to ransomware (e.g., ransom notes) within open directories.
author: none
